name: Pretty WikiFoundry
description: A custom stylesheet for WikiFoundry wikis which updates styles to look more modern, better suit the WikiFoundry branding/colour scheme and remove traces of Wetpaint branding still present on the site. This stylesheet affects all URLs ending with ".wikifoundry.com" - so if you're using a custom URL for your wiki, it will not work. Please message Maxwilly on WikiFoundry Central if you would like to have your custom URL added to the style.
